-> _ = "breakpoint"
(godebug) n
-> x = mul(x, x)
(godebug) list

4:     func main() {
5:     	x := mul(1, 2)
6:     	_ = "breakpoint"

8:     	if x == 4 {
9:     		fmt.Println("It works! x == 4.")
10:     	} else if n := 2; n == 3 {
11:     		fmt.Println("Math is broken. Ah!")

(godebug) step
-> var x int
(godebug) list

24:     	return n + m
25:     }
26:

28: --> 	var x int
29:     	for i := 0; i < m; i++ {
30:     		x = add(x, m)
31:     	}
32:     	return x

-> x = add(x, m)
(godebug) l

26: 
27:     func mul(n, m int) int {
28:     	var x int
29:     	for i := 0; i < m; i++ {
30: --> 		x = add(x, m)
31:     	}
